HegemonPack:SympathyStrike.NAME: Sympathy Strike
HegemonPack:SympathyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If played by a class other than a Hegemon, deal !M! rubimod:Necrotic damage on hit.

HegemonPack:Sandwiches.NAME: Sandwiches
HegemonPack:Sandwiches.DESCRIPTION: Heal ALL players by !M!. NL Exhaust.

HegemonPack:UmbralArmament.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL allies apply !M! rubimod:LeechToxin on hit this turn.

HegemonPack:ParentsRunaSchool.NAME: ..and Drink!

HegemonPack:WayoftheReaper.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Punish to ALL allies hands.

HegemonPack:UtterContempt.NAME: Utter Contempt
HegemonPack:UtterContempt.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! rubimod:Sin. NL This enemy's rubimod:Sin applies to their Poison.

HegemonPack:HegemonyAura.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an ally is attacked, apply !M! rubimod:Sin back.

HegemonPack:KindofHisThing.NAME: Kind of His Thing
HegemonPack:KindofHisThing.DESCRIPTION: ALL players gain buffs over time. NL It's kind of your "Thing".

HegemonPack:Moralise.NAME: Moralise

HegemonPack:KindofYourThing.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! health.
